title: Android 13 Beta 1: 12 new dual tone ‘Basic colors’ and Material You theme styles
content:
As part of the first Android 13 Beta, Pixel phones now have 12 new options for “basic color” themes that aren’t based on your current wallpaper, along with a handful of alternate Material You color theme styles.

more…

The post Android 13 Beta 1: 12 new dual tone ‘Basic colors’ and Material You theme styles appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 for Pixels adds 12 new "basic colors" that aren't based on your wallpaper, along with alternate Material You color theme styles.
